heading: Bio
text: Shavon Lloyd is an award-winning composer, baritone, and music educator whose works have been performed by professional choirs across the country. He recently made his operatic debut in a landmark all-Black production of Treemonisha. A three-time national composition contest winner and active voice at NYSSMA, he is currently pursuing his Master of Music at The Juilliard School while championing equity and creativity in music education.
